Verses: 1 pinbu Karththar Aaronai Nokki: Neeyum Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum Un Thagappan Vamsaththaarum Parisuththa Sthalaththaippatriya Akkiramaththai Sumakkavendum; Neeyum Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum Ungal Aasaariya Oozhiyaththaippatriya Akkiramaththai Sumakkavendum.

2 un Thagappanaagiya Leviyin Koththiraththaaraana Un Sagodhararaiyum Unnode Koodiyirukkavum Unnidaththile Sevikkavum Avargalai Serththukkol; Neeyum Un Kumaararumo Saatchiyin Koodaaraththukkumun Oozhiyam Seyyakkadaveergal.

3 avargal Un Kaavalaiyum Koodaaram Anaiththin Kaavalaiyum Kaakkakkadavargal; Aagilum Avargalum Neengalum Saagaadhapadikku, Avargal Parisuththa Sthalaththin Panimuttugalandaiyilum Palipeedaththandaiyilum Seraamal,
4 unnode Koodikkondu, Koodaaraththukkaduththa Ellaap Panividaiyaiyum Seyya, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Kaavalaikkaakkakkadavargal; Anniyan Oruvanum Ungalidaththil Serak Koodaadhu.
5 isravel Puththirarmel Inik Kadunkobam Varaadhapadikku, Neengal Parisuththa Sthalaththin Kaavalaiyum Palipeedaththin Kaavalaiyum Kaakkakkadaveergal.
6 aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Panividaiyai Seyya, Karththarukkuk Kodukkappatta Ungal Sagodhararaagiya Leviyarai Naan Isravel Puththirarilirundhu Piriththu, Ungalukkuth Thaththamaagak Koduththen.

7 aagaiyaal Neeyum Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum Palipeedaththukkum Thiraikku Utpuraththukkum Aduththa Ellaavatraiyum Seyyumporuttu, Ungal Aasaariya Oozhiyaththaik Kaaththu Sevikkakkadaveergal; Ungal Aasaariya Oozhiyaththai Ungalukku Thaththamaaga Arulinen; Adhaichcheyyumpadi Serugira Anniyan Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan Endraar.

8 pinnum Karththar Aaronai Nokki: Isravel Puththirar Parisuththappaduththugiravaigalilellaam Enakku Ereduththuppadaikkappadum Padaippugalaik Kaaththukkondirukkireergale, Avaigalai Unakkuk Koduththen; Abishegaththinimiththam Avaigalai Unakkum Un Kumaararukkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaagak Koduththen.

9 magaa Parisuththamaanavaigalile, Akkinikku Utpaduththappadaamal Unnudaiyadhaayiruppadhu Evaiyenil, Avargal Enakkup Padaikkum Ellaap Padaippum, Ellaap Pojanapaliyum, Ellaap Paavanivaaranapaliyum, Ellaak Kutranivaaranapaliyum, Unakkum Un Kumaararukkum Parisuththamaayirukkum.
10 parisuththa Sthalaththile Avaigalaip Pusikkavendum; Aanmakkal Yaavarum Avaigalaip Pusikkalaam; Avaigal Unakkup Parisuththamaayiruppadhaaga.

11 isravel Puththirar Ereduththupdaikkiradhum Asaivaattugiradhumaana Avargaludaiya Ellaak Kaanikkaigalin Padaippum Unnudaiyavaigalaayirukkum. Avaigalai Unakkum Un Kumaararukkum Un Kumaaraththigalukkum Niththiya Niyamamaagak Koduththen; Un Veettile Suththamaanavargal Ellaarum Avaigalaip Pusikkalaam.
12 avargal Karththarukkuk Kodukkum Avargaludaiya Mudharpalangalaagiya Uchchidhamaana Enneyaiyum, Uchchidhamaana Dhraatcharasaththaiyum, Dhaaniyaththaiyum Unakku Uriyadhaagak Koduththen.
13 thangal Dhesaththil Mudharpazhuththa Palanil Avargal Karththarukkuk Kondu Varuvadhellaam Unakku Uriyadhaagum; Un Veettile Suththamaayiruppavargal Yaavarum Avaigalaip Pusikkalaam.
14 isravelile Saabaththeetaaga Nerndhukollappattadhellaam Unakku Uriyadhaayirukkum.

15 manidharilum Mirugangalilum Avargal Karththarukku Seluththum Samastha Praanigalukkulle Garppanthirandhu Pirakkum Yaavum Unakku Uriyadhaayirukkum; Aanaalum Manidharin Mudharpetrai Agaththiyamaai Meetkavendum; Theettaana Mirugajeevanin Thalaiyeetraiyum Meetkavendum.

16 meetkavendiyavaigal Oru Maadhaththirku Merpattadhanaal, Un Madhippukku Isaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththin Sekkal Kanakkinpadi Aindhu Sekkal Panaththaale Avaigalai Meetkavendum; Oru Sekkal Irubadhu Keraa.

17 maattin Thalaiyeetrum, Semmariyaattin Thalaiyeetrum, Vellaattin Thalaiyeetrumo Meetkappadavendaam; Avaigal Parisuththamaanavaigal; Avaigalin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Theliththu, Avaigalin Kozhuppaik Karththarukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Thaganamaagath Thaganikkavendum.
18 asaivaattum Maarkkandaththaippolum Valadhu Munnanthodaiyaippolum Avaigalin Maamsamum Unnudaiyadhaagum.

19 isravel Puththirar Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkira Parisuththa Padaippugalaiyellaam Unakkum Un Kumaararukkum Un Kumaaraththigalukkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaagak Koduththen; Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Idhu Unakkum Un Sandhadhikkum Endraikkum Sellum Maaraadha Udanpadikkai Endraar.

20 pinnum Karththar Aaronai Nokki: Avargaludaiya Dhesaththil Nee Ondraiyum Sudhandhariththukkollavendaam, Avargal Naduve Unakkup Pangu Undaayirukkavum Vendaam; Isravel Puththirar Naduvil Naane Un Pangum Un Sudhandharamumaai Irukkiren.
21 idho, Leviyin Puththirar Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Panividaiyai Seygira Avargaludaiya Velaikkaaga, Isravelarukkullavai Ellaavatrilum Thasamapaagaththai Avargalukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduththen.
22 isravel Puththirar Kutranchumandhu Saagaadhapadikku, Ini Aasarippuk Koodaaraththaik Kittaadhirukkakkadavargal.

23 leviyarmaaththiram Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkaduththa Velaigalai Seyyavendum; Avargal Thangal Akkiramaththai Sumappaargal; Isravel Puththirar Naduve Avargalukku Sudhandharam Illai Enbadhu Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkum.

24 isravel Puththirar Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Padaippaagiya Thasamapaagaththai Leviyarukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduththen; Aagaiyaal Isravel Puththirarin Naduve Avargalukku Sudhandharamillaiyendru Avargalukku Sonnen Endraar.
25 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

26 nee Leviyarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Puththirar Kaiyil Vaangikkollumpadi Naan Ungalukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduththa Thasamapaagaththai Neengal Avargal Kaiyil Vaangumpodhu, Thasamapaagaththil Paththil Oru Pangaik Karththarukkuereduththuppadaikkum Padaippaaga Seluththavendum.
27 neengal Ereduththup Padaikkum Indhap Padaippu Kalaththin Dhaaniyaththaippolum, Aalaiyin Rasaththaippolum Ungalukku Ennappadum.

28 ippadiye Neengal Isravel Puththirar Kaiyil Vaangum Thasamapaagamaagiya Ungal Pangugalilellaam Neengalum Karththarukku Endru Oru Padaippai Ereduththup Padaiththu, Andhap Padaippai Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronukkuk Kodukkavendum.
29 ungalukkuk Kodukkappadugira Ovvoru Kaanikkaiyilumulla Uchchidhamaana Parisuththa Pangaiyellaam Karththarukku Ereduththup Padaikkum Padaippaaga Seluththavendum.

30 aadhalaal Nee Avargalode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Adhil Uchchidhamaanadhai Neengal Ereduththup Padaikkumpodhu, Adhu Kalaththin Varaththilum Aalaiyin Varaththilum Irundhu Eduththu Seluththugiradhupola Leviyarukku Ennappadum.
31 adhai Neengalum Ungal Kudumbaththaarum Evvidaththilum Pusikkalaam; Adhu Neengal Aasarippuk Koodaaraththile Seyyum Panividaikku Eedaana Ungal Sambalam.

32 ippadi Adhil Uchchidhamaanadhai Ereduththup Padaiththeergalaanaal, Neengal Adhinimiththam Paavam Sumakkamaatteergal; Neengal Saagaadhirukkumpadikku, Isravel Puththirarin Parisuththamaanavaigalaith Theettuppaduththalaagaadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
